hero.description: Upload 8 photos, arrange them in a beautiful layout, and export a print-ready A4 PDF -- all in your browser.

arrangeCard.title: Arrange Layout
arrangeCard.swapHint: Click a photo to select it, then click another to swap their positions.

uploader.dropHint: Drop your photos here or click to browse
uploader.fileTypes: JPG, PNG, WebP or GIF. {count}/{max} photos uploaded.
uploader.toastUploadFailedDesc: Some photos could not be uploaded. Please try again.

preview.printDescription: This is the flat print layout with fold and cut guides. Top row pages are printed upside-down so they read correctly when folded.
preview.bookletDescription: This is how your fanzine will look as a booklet after folding. Use arrow keys or buttons to flip through.
preview.specs: A4 landscape, 300 DPI, with fold & cut guides
preview.toastSuccessDesc: Your zine has been downloaded successfully.
preview.toastFailedDesc: Something went wrong generating the PDF.
